name: CVE-2010-1292
description: The implementation of pami RIFF chunk parsing in Adobe Shockwave Player before 11.5.7.609 does not validate a certain value from a file before using it in file-pointer calculations, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted .dir (aka Director) file.
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:5.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:4.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:8.5.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:11.5.1.601:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:11.0.0.456:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:10.1.0.11:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:11.5.0.596:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:11.5.2.602:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:11.5.0.595:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:9:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:2.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:apple:macos:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:adobe:shockwave_player:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2003:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
